trans-unit.source: System-wide properties set programmatically (as a command-line option to the JVM when starting the application or within application code)

seg-source.mrk: System-wide properties set programmatically (as a command-line option to the JVM when starting the application or within application code)

target.mrk: System-wide properties set programmatically (as a command-line option to the JVM when starting the application or within application code)

trans-unit.source: System-wide properties set in the derby.properties file

seg-source.mrk: System-wide properties set in the derby.properties file

target.mrk: System-wide properties set in the derby.properties file

trans-unit.source: This means, for example, that system-wide properties set programmatically override database-wide properties and system-wide properties set in the derby.properties file, and that database-wide properties override system-wide properties set in the derby.properties file.

seg-source.mrk: This means, for example, that system-wide properties set programmatically override database-wide properties and system-wide properties set in the derby.properties file, and that database-wide properties override system-wide properties set in the derby.properties file.

target.mrk: This means, for example, that system-wide properties set programmatically override database-wide properties and system-wide properties set in the derby.properties file, and that database-wide properties override system-wide properties set in the derby.properties file.
